full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS RTZA SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA CHOS @003B SKYONG LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LAS BZHI'I RTZA SHING ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHAL BA BIKshA BA BADZRA MING 'CHANG BAS BRIS 'DI LA MA RIG DBANG GIS NOR 'KHRUL TSOGS RNAMS CI MCHIS PA, BLA MA LHA RANG BLO GROS MIG YANGS MKHAS PA RNAMS BZOD PAR GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN PAR, SKYABS SNAS KUN 'DUS BLA MA PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS PAR SHOG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
